title: Embroidery Fonts
content:
i don't think those are fonts that i could buy and use on a computer, but i'm looking for anything more or less similar. more so for the angle script than the "blockletter" (weird sans). thanks for any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120625104706im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fonts_3433.gif)

sorry for the small image, i don't have anything bigger. anything near it will do, doesnt have to be an exact ID.
author: thierry blancpain

comments.content: i know the samples are really small, but.. anyone?

The first script with a similar C I stumbled upon ( [http://new.myfonts.com/search/script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120625104706/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/script/ "http://new.myfonts.com/search/script/")) is La Portena ( [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/la-portenia/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120625104706/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/la-portenia/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/la-portenia/")).
